E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Progress of Randall Trimble
Dear Sir,
Randall Trimble has nothing more to prove at A Longmont Storm!
He has an ERA of 2.43 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director

I believe he is ready for the next level!

Date: Thursday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Status of Thomas Rymer
Dear Sir,
Thomas Rymer shouldn't play at AA St. Paul Saint!
He has an AVG of .242 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director

the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Thursday, 5/29/1993
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,

in my last year of the contract.

Clinton Lane
